data.eml:eml: Dendroblatta iani (Rocha e Silva-Albuquerque, 1964) n. comb. (Ectobiidae, Blattellinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Sonia Maria, Oliveira, Edivar Heeren De, Silva, Luiz Rafael Silva Da (2014): Dendroblatta iani (Rocha e Silva-Albuquerque, 1964) n. comb. (Ectobiidae, Blattellinae). Zootaxa 3861 (5): 498-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.5.8
